column4: can someone help me get my networking running, i'm pretty sure it's a dns issue, but i don't know how to fix it
resolv.conf says not to edit it, that it will be overwritten
whats wrong?
i can't ping anything.  i have no dns
can you ping ip address'?
i set it in resolv.conf but apparently that file gets overwriettin
i don't have any outside my network to try, but i'm pretty sure i could
Mchael: 64.233.187.99 - google
yeah that works
and that works too
why can't you set the DNS servers in the GUI,
i have no gui.  i'm trying to install that now.
but i can't install without network
oh are you usig server version?
yeah
ok thats good i did this the other day. one second ill check
okay thanks
it appears that i just put the nameservers in to /etc/resolv.conf
when does it get overwritten? on reboot?
not sure, i just know they got overwritten.  that's where i put them too.  but it says at the top that resolv.conf gets overwritten
it doesn't say that in my file, what version o ubuntu are you using?
dapper
is DHCP enabled?
